title: Trump migrant crackdown: After Panama, Costa Rica offers ‘bridge’ for Indians deported by US
description: Trump migrant crackdown: Central American nation Costa Rica has announced plans to welcome Indian and Central Asian migrants who the Donald Trump government is deporting. The deportees will be kept in a detention centre in Costa Rica till they leave for their country of origin, the Latin American co...

title: Costa Rica says will accept Indians, Central Asians deported by US
description: The Central American nation of Costa Rica has said it will receive illegal migrants from other countries who are being deported by the United States, with an official statement saying the first flight with 200 people from Central Asia and India is expected on Wednesday. title: Costa Rica says will accept Indians, Central Asians deported by US
description:
The Central American nation of Costa Rica has said it will receive illegal migrants from other countries who are being deported by the United States, with an official statement saying the first flight with 200 people from Central Asia and India is expected on Wednesday.

title: Why is Costa Rica taking Indian deportees from US?
description:
Costa Rica has agreed to serve as a "bridge" to repatriate illegal immigrants in the United States, including from India and Central Asia, according to an official release on Tuesday.

IMAGE: Handcuffed and chained deportees board a US military aircraft. Photograph: @USBPChief/X
